text: @jeffsessions @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden He admitted on camera to directing his admin to slow down COVID-19 testing.Over 120,000 Americans have died since February. He had a reasonable duty of care and his order was an INTENTIONAL act that caused more Americans to become infected, and die... and you still lick his boots
